SA15arhebt_u:340_1: ādigrahaṇāt `kākasya kārṣṇyāt' ityādi vyadhikaraṇāsiddhaṃ parihṛtaṃ hetutvena nirastaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:341: dharmidharma iti tu sāmānye[nābhi]dhānāt teṣām api hetutā syād[57]iti /
SA15arhebt_u:343: tato 'narthaka evopacāra ity āha paraḥ -- dharmavacanenāpi na kevalaṃ dha[rmiva]canena /
SA15arhebt_u:344: dharmyāśrayasiddhau dharmiṇa āśrayaṇam āśrayaḥ parigrahas tasya siddhis tasyāṃ satyām /
SA15arhebt_u:345: kiṃ punar ddharmasya dharmyākṣepanimittam iti cet[59]?
SA15arhebt_u:346: parā[śrayatvā]t -- dharmiparatantratvāt dharmasya avaśyam asau dharmiṇam ākṣipati /
SA15arhebt_u:347: tato dharmivacanam atiricyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ sādhyadharmiṇam eva pratipādayati,
SA15arhebt_u:349: syān matam -- dharmigrahaṇād viśiṣṭo 'tra dharmī kaścid abhipreta iti gamyate,
SA15arhebt_u:350: sa tu sādhyadharmīti kuta ity āha -- pratyāsatter nyāyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:358: kadācid[62]vyāptidarśanapūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy api prathamaṃ hetusadbhāvopadarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:359: yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmisiddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāt tarhi bhaviṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:360: yataḥ tadaṃśavyāptyā hetubhūtayā dṛṣṭāntadharmini dharmasya satva(ttva)siddheḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:361: na hi [T. 214a.] dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayituṃ śakyata iti manyate /
SA15arhebt_u:362: tato dharmigrahaṇād vyatiricyamānāt sādhyadharmiṇa eva parigrahaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:363: tadaṃśena iti ca tacchabdena dharmavacanākṣipto dharmī sambhantsyata iti tatsambhandhanārtham api dharmigrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
SA15arhebt_u:364: yatra prayojanāntaraṃ na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣyaviṣayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:365: dharmivacanasya tv anyad api prayojanaṃ sambhāvyate /
SA15arhebt_u:367: iti manyamānaḥsiddhāntavādy āha -- siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyādṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi satva(ttve)
SA15arhebt_u:368: punar ddharmiṇo [S. 14a.] vacanaṃdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥsa hetur iti niyamārthamāśaṅkyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:370: na kṛtakatvādaya iti aniṣṭam eva syāt tasmād upacāraḥkartavyaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:371: kiṃ punastarkkaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ kvacit niyamārthavacanam ity ata āha -- dṛṣṭaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:373: tatra yaḥ[63] san sajātīye[64] -- [NMu 7] ity atrā ''cāryīye hetulakṣaṇe `sajātīya e[va] satva(ttva)
SA15arhebt_u:374: m' ity avadhāraṇena siddhe 'pi hetor vyatireke /
SA15arhebt_u:377: vacanaṃ tanniyamārthamācāryeṇa vyākhyāta[m a]saty[65]eva nāstitā yathā syāt nānyatra na viruddha iti /
SA15arhebt_u:387: tathā hi -- sādhyadharmeṇa vyāpto 'pi dharmo yadi kvacid dharmiṇy upalabhyeta tadā tatraiva svavyāpakapratītiṃ janayet nānyatra [pratyā]sattiviprakarṣābhyāṃ yathākramam /
SA15arhebt_u:388: anupalabdhas tu kvacid dharmiṇi kathaṃ gamakaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:389: tathābhāve[67]vā sarvatra svavyāpakaṃ gamayet pratyāsattiviprakarṣābhāvād e[vety ata] āha -- tasmāt sāmarthyāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:390: yad idam anantaraṃ sāmarthyaṃ samupavarṇitam asmāt sāmarthyād arthasya sādhyadharmiparigrahalakṣaṇasya bhavati pratīti[r pa]ṭudhiyāṃ śrotṝṇām,
SA15arhebt_u:391: kintv aśabdakam arthaṃ svayam anusaratāṃ pratipattigauravaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:392: tadupacāramātrāt svayam aśabdakārthābhyūharahitād dharmidharma ity ane[na pa]kṣadharma iti {1}samānirddeśāt
SA15arhebt_u:394: {2}pratipattigauravaṃca iti caśabdenaitad āha -- ye paropadeśam ākāṅkṣanti,
SA15arhebt_u:395: tair ayam artho lakṣaṇa[vaca]nād boddhavya iti.[S.15a.]
SA15arhebt_u:396: yathālakṣaṇaṃ pratīter apakṣadharmo na hetur iti kutaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:403: [60] yasya kasyacid dharmiṇo dharmasya hetutvam iti vyāptinyāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:411: [63] yaḥ san sajātīye sapakṣe san vidyamānas tadatyaye sādhyasyābhāve vipakṣe ca dvedhā'san sad asan yadi na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:412: kintv asann eva vipakṣe yadi bhavati tadaiva samyag ghetur iti bhāvaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:413: [64] yaḥsan sajātīye 'san tadatyaya itidignāgācāryīyaṃsūtraṃ vyākhyātam atra
SA15arhebt_u:414: [65] abhāvarūpa anyarūpe viruddharūpe vā nāstitā yasya sa hetur ity arthaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:421: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāc ca pakṣadharma ity atra nānyaḥ samāsaḥ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:422: tathā ca pakṣasyaiva dharma [i]ty evam avadhāraṇāt tadaṃśavyāptir virudhyata iti viruddhalakṣaṇatām udbhāvayann āha -- [T. 215a.] pakṣasya dharmatve tvaṃ(taṃ)
SA15arhebt_u:423: pakṣaṃviśeṣaṇam anyato vyavacchedakam apekṣata iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya dharmasya anyatra pakṣīkṛtād anyasmin sapakṣe ananuvṛttiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:424: tathā hi -- yaḥ pakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasyaiva bhavati nānya[sya] /
SA15arhebt_u:425: yathā -- yo devadattasya putraḥ sa tasyaiva putro na yajñadattasyāpi /
SA15arhebt_u:430: tato yadi pakṣadharmo na ta[daṃśe]na vyāptiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:431: [S. 15b.] atha tadaṃśavyāptir na pakṣadharma iti vyāhataṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:432: nanu ca tadaṃśavyāptir nāma sādhyadharmasya vyāpakasya tatra hetau sati tadādhāradharmiṇi bhāva eva,
SA15arhebt_u:433: vyāpyasya vā hetos tatraiva vyāpake sādhyadharme saty eva bhāva iti svasādhyāvinābhāvalakṣaṇā vakṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:434: na cānayā 'vaśyaṃ pakṣīkṛtād anyatra vṛttir ākṣipyate,
SA15arhebt_u:436: tathā hi -- tatraiva pakṣīkṛte saty eva sādhyadharme hetur varttamānas tadaṃśavyāptiṃ pratipadyata eva /
SA15arhebt_u:437: yaiva cāsya sādhyadharmiṇi svasādhyāvinābhāvitā saiva gamakatve nibandhanaṃ nānyadharmiṇi /
SA15arhebt_u:439: na sapakṣe kvacid bahulaṃ vā sahabhāvamātradarśananibandhanaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:440: na hi lohalekhyaṃ vajram pārthivatvāt kāṣṭhādivat iti tadanyatra pārthivatvasya [T. 215b.] lohalekhyatā 'vinābhāvo 'pi tathābhāvo bhavati [S. 16a.] /
SA15arhebt_u:441: yadi ca pakṣīkṛtād anyatraiva vyāptir ādarśayitavyeti niyamas tadā satvaṃ(ttvaṃ)
SA15arhebt_u:446: yad api kaiścit jvālādeḥ kṣaṇikatvam abhyupagamyate tad api na pratyakṣataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:448: anyatraiva ca vyāptir ādarśanīyā na sādhyadharmiṇy apīti ko 'yaṃ nyāyaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:451: tasmāt svasādhyapratibandhād hetus tena vyāptaḥ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:452: sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmiṇy api sidhyatīti na kiñcid
SA15arhebt_u:454: ata evānyatroktam[71]-- [S. 16b.] yat[72]kvacid[73] dṛṣṭaṃ[74] tasya[75] yatra[76] pratibandhaḥtadvidhaḥ[77] tasya[78] tad[79] gamakaṃtatreti[80] vastugatiḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:469: yad api anumeye 'tha tattulye sadbhāvaḥ-- ity[81]ādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāpi sādhyadharmavān[82]eva sapakṣa ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:470: tataḥ satyeva sādhyadharme vā 'stīty evaṃ param etat /
SA15arhebt_u:471: tataś ca taddharmaṇaḥ sādhyadharmiṇo 'pi vāstavaṃ sapakṣatvaṃ na vyāvarttate /
SA15arhebt_u:473: tasmāt tadaṃśavyāptivacanena svasādhyāvinābhāvitvasya pratibandhanibandhanasyānyathā tadayogād[83]abhidhānān nāvaśya[T. 216a.]m anyatra vṛttir ākṣipteti,
SA15arhebt_u:476: yadi sarvasya hetoḥ pakṣīkṛte eva dharmiṇi svasādhyapratibandhaḥ pramāṇato niścetuṃ śakyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:477: [S. 17a.] yathā sattvalakṣaṇasya svabhāvahetoḥ kṣaṇikatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ tādātmyaṃ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā /
SA15arhebt_u:481: tasmāt tasyānyatraiva[84][prasiddhir iti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya tatra apekṣaṇāt anya]trānanuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇatā sambhavamātreṇāśaṅkitā /
SA15arhebt_u:490: yatra dharmiṇi dha]rmasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃdihyate tatrā 'yogavyavacchedasya nyāyaprāptatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:492: caitre hi dhanurdhara]tvaṃ saṃdihyate kim asti nāsti iti /
SA15arhebt_u:493: tataś caitro dhanurddhara iti tatsadbhāvapratipādikā śrutiḥ [T. 216b.] [pakṣāntaram adhanurdharatvaṃ śrotur āśaṅkopasthāpitaṃ] nirākarotīty ayogavyavacchedo 'tra nyāyaprāptaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:498: iha pārthe] hi dhanurddharatvaṃ siddham eveti nāyogāśaṅkā /
SA15arhebt_u:500: nāstīty anyayoga[śaṅkāyāṃ śrotuḥ yadā pārtho dhanurdhara iti ucya]te tadā 'nyayogavyavacchedo nyāyaprāptaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:501: pratipādyāśaṅkopasthāpitayor eva pakṣayoḥ para[sparaṃ virodhāt ekanirdeśena anyayogavyavacchedasya] nyāyabalāyātatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:502: tad iha pakṣe 'sty ayaṃ dharmo na veti saṃśītau [pakṣadharma ity ukte pakṣasya dharma eva [S. 18b.] nādharmaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:503: dharmaś ca āśritatvād viśeṣaṇaṃ tenāyogo vya]vacchidyate nānyayogas tadaṃśavyāptyā tasya pratipādita[tvena dṛṣṭānte saṃdehābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:509: na tadaṃśaḥ tasya ca eka]deśābhāvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:518: tatra ca so 'sādhāraṇo dharmo yasya tasyeti vyākhyeyam /
SA15arhebt_u:522: [86] prāk pravṛttaṃ ca tat gṛhītaṃ tad vismṛtaṃ ca tat pratibandhasādhakapramāṇaṃ ca tasya smṛtaya iti samāsaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:525: tasya pakṣadharmasya sato vyāptiḥ -- yo vyāpnoti yaś ca vyāpyate [tadubhayadharmatayā[87]pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:526: yadā vyāpakadharmatayā vivakṣyate ta]dā vyāpakasya gamyasya[88]/
SA15arhebt_u:527: tatreti [T. 217a.] sat saptamy arthapradhānam etat nādhārapradhānam,
SA15arhebt_u:529: {p. 18.1} tenāyam arthaḥ -- yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyam asti tatra sarvvatra bhāva eva[89]vyāpakasya svagato dharmo vyāptiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:538: vivakṣā vyāptes tadā vyāpyasya vā gamakasya tatraiva vyāpake gamye sati /
SA15arhebt_u:541: atrāpi vyāpyasyaiva tatra bhāva ity avadhāraṇaṃ hetvabhāvaprasakter[94]eva nāśritam,
SA15arhebt_u:547: tu vyāpter ubhayatra [S. 19b.] tulyadharmatayaikākārā pratītiḥ saṃyogivat mā bhūd iti pradarśanārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:548: tathā hi -- pūrvatrāyogavyavacchedenāvadhāraṇam [T. 217b.] uttaratrānyayogavyavacchedeneti kuta ubhayatraikākāratā vyāpteḥ? / taduktam --
SA15arhebt_u:549: liṅge liṅgībhavaty eva liṅginy evetarat punaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:552: na ca kenacid aṃśena na saṃyogīhutāśanaḥ/
SA15arhebt_u:553: dhūmo vāsarvathā[99] tena prāptaṃdhūmāt prakāśanam // iti /
SA15arhebt_u:555: tathā hi -- saṃyogasya ubhayatrāviśeṣāt eṣa prasaṅgo na tu vyāpteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:557: {p. 19.1} vyāpakadharme vyāptiḥ tādṛśy eva vyāpyadharma iti / tathā cāha -
SA15arhebt_u:559: ādhārādheyavad vṛttis tasya saṃyogivan na tu // iti / [S. 20a.]
SA15arhebt_u:560: tena vyāpako vyāpyo na bhavati vyāpyaś ca [na] vyāpaka iti /
SA15arhebt_u:561: tadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ iti vacanāt na saṃyogipakṣokto doṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:579: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmo api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:580: dhūmasyāpi dhūmatvapaṇḍutvādiviśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmāḥ gamakā bhaveyuḥ saṃyogasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt
SA15arhebt_u:583: yadi tarhi pakṣadharmas tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ ity etad dhetulakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ tadaṃśavyāptiś ceti dvirūpo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:584: anyatra ca trirūpa uktaḥ tat kathaṃ na vyāghātaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:585: ity āha etena tadaṃśavyāptivacanena anvayo vyatireko vāuktaḥ veditavya iti sambandhaḥ [T. 218a.] /
SA15arhebt_u:587: tathā hi -- ya[100]eva yenānvito[101]yan[102]nivṛttau ca nivṛttate sa[103]eva tena[104]vyāpta ucyata iti tadātmakatvād vyāpter vyāptivacanenānvayavyatirekābhidhānam /
SA15arhebt_u:588: tato vyāptivacanena rūpadvayābhidhānāt na vyāghāta iti / [S. 20b.]
SA15arhebt_u:598: niścayaśca tayor naikenaiva pramāṇena api tu yathāsvam /
SA15arhebt_u:599: yasya yad ātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ niścāyakaṃ tena /
SA15arhebt_u:600: yasya ca yat niścāyakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tad uttaratra vakṣyati /
SA15arhebt_u:602: tena sādharmyavaidharmyavatoḥ prayogayor ekenaiva dvitīyagater vidhipratiṣedharūpatayā vyāvṛttibhede 'pi paramārthatas tādātmyāt nobhayopadarśanam iti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:603: vyatireko hi sādhyanivṛttau liṅgasya nivṛttidharmakatvaṃ[105]svabhāvabhūto dharma ity anvayarūpatā vastuto 'sya na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:611_1: upacārato niścaya ucyate -- pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasyānadhigatārthādhigantṛtvābhāvaṃ darśayituṃ /
SA15arhebt_u:612: tena yady api sāmānyarūpaṃ liṅgam avasthāpyate tathāpi svalakṣaṇapratītir eva tadvyavasthānibandhanam iti pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi prasiddhir ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:615: pramāṇaphalabhedāc[107]ca anumānataḥ anumānena niścayaḥ iti āha /
SA15arhebt_u:616: atrodāharaṇe yathākramaṃ yathāpradeśe [Tt. 356a.] dhūmasya dhūmasāmānyasya pratyakṣato niścayaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:619: [106] nanu nirvikalpakena pratyakṣeṇa kathaṃ sāmānyātmano liṅgasya grahaṇam? ity āha
SA15arhebt_u:620: [107] bauddhamate na pramityātmakaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ bhinnaṃ kiñcid asti /
SA15arhebt_u:621: kintu bhedam abhyupagamya anumānena niścaya iti ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:625_0: yas tu manyate -- `yaḥ pradeśo 'gnisambandhī so 'pratyakṣo yas tu pratyakṣo nabhobhagarūpa
SA15arhebt_u:625_1: ālokādyātmā[108]dhūmavat tayā dṛśyamāno na so 'gnimān ataḥ kathaṃ pradeśe dhūmasya
SA15arhebt_u:627: sāgnir ayaṃ dhūmaḥ dhūmatvāt ity evaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ' iti -- tasyāpi sāgneḥ dhūmāvayavasyā 'pratyakṣatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:634: pradeśe eva ca loko 'gniṃ pratipadyate, na dhūme /
SA15arhebt_u:640: [109] dhūmakāle eva cāgniḥ sādhyate na bhasmakāle
SA15arhebt_u:644: atra yathopavarṇitaṃ pratyakṣataḥ [S. 23a.] pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi prasiddhāv abhiprāyam apratipadyamānaḥkumārilaḥ-- `kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa(ṇā)
SA15arhebt_u:645: vikalpena sāmānyātmano liṅgasya dhūmādeḥ svrūpagra[haṇa]m api tāvad yujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:646: dharmiṇo vā kuta eva tatsambandhagrahaṇam' -- iti pratyavatasthe /
SA15arhebt_u:647: tena hi pratyakṣapūrvakatvāc cānumānāder ddharmaṃpratyanimittatvam [ŚBh 1.1.4.] ity etadbhāṣyam -
SA15arhebt_u:660: {p. 22.1}[h3]iti bruvatā -- `saugat[h4]ānām evāyaṃ liṅgadharmitatsambandhāgrāhaṇalakṣaṇo doṣo yeṣām avikalpakam eva pratyakṣaṃ,
SA15arhebt_u:661: nāsmākaṃ savikalpam api pratyakṣam icchatām' [S. 23b.] ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:663_0: ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- pratyakṣaṃ hi purovasthitam auttarādharyeṇa dhūmapradeśādikaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:663_4: tayoś cauttarādharyam `evam etat nānyathā' iti vikalpayati /
SA15arhebt_u:665: tato dharmadharmiṇoḥ svarūpaniścayaḥ sambandhaniścayaś ca pratyakṣanibandhanaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:667: tathā hi -- ayam eva dhūmapradeśayoḥ sambandhasya niścayo yaḥ `ātrāyam' ity adhyavasāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:668: sa cāvikalpenāpi pratyakṣeṇa yathoktena prakāreṇa sampādita eva /
SA15arhebt_u:669: na cauttarādharyāvasthitād vastudvayād anya [S. 24a.] eva kaścid ādhā[rādhe]yabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ yataḥ tasya [T. 220b.] pratyakṣeṇānanubhūtatvāt paścāda(d)

SA15arhebt_u:1276_1: [S. 47b.] anvayaniścayaḥ `yatra yatra sādhanadharmas tatra sādhyadharmaḥ' ity evaṃ rūpo jāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:1277: atrodāharaṇaṃ yathā-- yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva /

SA15arhebt_u:1284: tad evaṃ vidhaṃ vastutvaṃ hīyate nivartate,

SA15arhebt_u:1295: evaṃ svabhāvahetau [T. 236a] viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito 'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya kāryahetau pratipādayann āha -- kāryahetau anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:1298: tasya yā siddhiḥ pratītiḥ sā kāryahetāv anvayaniścayaḥ /

SA15arhebt_u:1310: taddeśasannihitam apy anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatayāgnyādisāmagrī sannidhānāt prāganupalabdham iti /

SA15arhebt_u:1330: punaś codye sa eva parihāro 'navasthā ca /

SA15arhebt_u:1334: tad api tatra kāraṇam astu iti cet; na,
SA15arhebt_u:1340: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt /

SA15arhebt_u:1345: tadabhāve kāraṇatvābhimatasyā 'bhāve abhāva[217] eva kāryatvenābhimatasyābhāvaś ca /

SA15arhebt_u:1364: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvād anyas tadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyam anubhavet? /

SA15arhebt_u:1399_4: [S. 53a.] janyatāyāṃ vā yadi samagrāḥ svarūpata eva tāṃ janayanti kārye ka eṣāṃ śaktivyāghātaḥ?

SA15arhebt_u:2697: yat tv abhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakam ucyate tasyaikasthitāv api bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvāc ca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2698: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vā na janayet /
SA15arhebt_u:2699: tasmād yeṣu bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛśṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:2700: atha sāmagrīṃ kāraṇam āśrityocyate `na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syād iti',
SA15arhebt_u:2702: {2}yathāsvaṃ yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥ ya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvas tadbhedena tadviśeṣopayogataḥ tasya -- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
SA15arhebt_u:2704: teṣūpayogataḥ [T. 271a.] tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ -- kāryāṇāṃ viśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ [S. 96b.] teṣām asaṅkarāt paras paravyāvṛttarūpatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2705: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇām iti kathan na kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2712: bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ{p. 94.1} kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇām asāṅkaryād asty eva sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2713: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣām upayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt katham asāṅkaryam? /
SA15arhebt_u:2718: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇām anyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatas tadbhāve tan na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2719: janakatvaṃ hy eṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2720: tatraikasyānekasya vā bhāve teṣām ekānekajanakatvam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2728: nanv ekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2731: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayor api bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayor vijñānātmatā,
SA15arhebt_u:2732: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? / āha ca --
SA15arhebt_u:2741: anyādṛśī ca vijñānader iti tadvailakṣaṇyād eva [S. 97b.] kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
SA15arhebt_u:2742: syād etat -- sarveṣāṃ anvayavyatirekāv anuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇair iti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ -- ihopādānabhāve bheda(-bhāveneda)
SA15arhebt_u:2746: tathā hi -- vijñānaṃ manaskārasya bodharūpatām anukaroti,
SA15arhebt_u:2749: niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2756_0: yayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ janayanty aparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanam
SA15arhebt_u:2756_1: iti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāc cakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ parasparato
SA15arhebt_u:2765: tasmād yadi `kāraṇabhedāt' kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasya bhedaḥ anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvād anekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2766: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2767: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2768: tadā[402]tasyeha[403]bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt?
SA15arhebt_u:2772: ubhayaṃ[405]caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭam iti darśayann āha -- yathā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2773: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekarūpatā /
SA15arhebt_u:2775: tatra [T. 272b.] sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati -- mṛtpiṇḍāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2776_1: tadanyajanyebhyo bhinnasvabhāvāni [S. 98b.] yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇam
SA15arhebt_u:2777: tathā hi -- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣāder vilakṣaṇam evopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2779: tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaś ca kevalamṛtpiṇḍād bhinnasvabhāvatayā tatkāryād apīṣṭakāder vilakṣaṇam eva karoti /
SA15arhebt_u:2781: api tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryam karoti tadvilakṣaṇam eva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāranāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2782: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopādānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayas tebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:2783_0: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahakāribhāvenopayujyamānāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā
SA15arhebt_u:2783_1: mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo
SA15arhebt_u:2783_2: yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍas tadanyanimittasahita [S. 99a.] upādānam iṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:2785_0: bhinnātmakatayā cakrāder vibhakto vicchinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati tasmād anu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo
SA15arhebt_u:2785_1: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmād ekaikakāryād dvidvikāryāc ca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
SA15arhebt_u:2785_2: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparam asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ[407]siddhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2789: yata [S. 99b.] evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeveṣṭakācakrāvibhaktaghaṭa tadvibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi bhavanti tat tasmāt evam uktena prakāreṇa
SA15arhebt_u:2790: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitād anyasāmagryantarbhūtāt na mṛtsvabhāvatā kasyacit kāryasya,
SA15arhebt_u:2801: [407] teṣāṃ kāraṇānām upayogaiḥ vyāpāraiḥ kāryā ye svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ teṣām
SA15arhebt_u:2808_0: tad evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kārasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇām anekatve 'py
SA15arhebt_u:2808_1: anekātmatāvirahaṃ pratipādayann āha -- na ca tayoḥ mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ
SA15arhebt_u:2808_2: yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya[412]tadanyāvasthāviṣayād
SA15arhebt_u:2808_3: bhede saty api yathā tadanyasmād bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2811: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
SA15arhebt_u:2812: kathaṃ punar eta[d] jñāyate `tadanyasmād iva [S. 100a.] svabhāvato 'py asya bhedo nāsti' ity ata āha -- mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:2813_0: yadi hi mṛtkulālayoḥ tadavasthābhāvinoḥ śaktiviśeṣaviṣayo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmako
SA15arhebt_u:2813_1: bhedas tadanyasmād iva svarūpato bhidyeta tadā mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā
SA15arhebt_u:2813_2: parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
SA15arhebt_u:2816: na[413]hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
SA15arhebt_u:2818: jñānaṃ vā tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃ tadrūpam anukartuṃ yuktam,
SA15arhebt_u:2820: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayor ekātmataiveti [T. 274a.] na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
SA15arhebt_u:2825_0: paramārthatas tu tatsāmagryantarggatānāṃ sajātīyasyā 'pi kṣaṇāntarasyārambhāt sāmagryantarāvayavatvena
SA15arhebt_u:2825_1: ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcid ekaṃ nāsti tathā 'nekapratyayajanitam
SA15arhebt_u:2825_2: apīti kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2833: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayor ekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhyādibhedād bheda iṣyate tat katham anekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etad udāharanām syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2834: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhyāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāc cābheda iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2836: tathā hi -- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2843: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhyādibhir bhedaḥ deśādibhis tv abheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatā 'sty eva /
SA15arhebt_u:2846: yat punar ekaṃ tat sahakāriṇām abhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇam eveti na vyabhicāra iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2848: svabhāvato bhedānabhyupagame anyathā[416]bhedāsiddheḥ anekasmād ekakāryotpatter abhādhanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2849: svabhāvato bhedopagame vā 'parasparātmatayā mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaṃ durnnivāram /
SA15arhebt_u:2850: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2852: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhyādaya ātmabhūtam abhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2856: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
SA15arhebt_u:2857: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācit ekavacanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2858: [S. 101b.] sambhavi dharmirūpamātram abhidheyatvena vivakṣitam iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:2861: vrīhaya iti ca jātivacane [T. 275a.] dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñcid uttaram /
SA15arhebt_u:2862: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
SA15arhebt_u:2863: tataś caiko gurur iti sāmānādhikaraṇy adarśanāt paryāyā apy ekasaṃkhyāviṣayāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2868: ekasminn api saṃjñābhedadṛṣṭeḥ katham asya bhedanimittatā? /
SA15arhebt_u:2870: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇāc ca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt_u:2873: na hi śaktir eva indati śaknoti dārayati ca /
SA15arhebt_u:2879: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācid arthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
SA15arhebt_u:2881: na hy eko bhāvaḥ kvacid apy anvayī siddha iti /
SA15arhebt_u:2882: tathā hi -- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ {p. 100.1} dravyamahrīkair iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2885: na hy asya paryāyāṇām ivocchedaḥ tadrūpeṇa[418],
SA15arhebt_u:2886: paryāyā [T. 275b.] eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyam iti nityam abhyupagamyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2890: na punas tat tato vilakṣaṇam upalakṣyate /
SA15arhebt_u:2891: kāryabhedas tv asmān prati asiddha eva /
SA15arhebt_u:2895: tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanibandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:2896: tat tu na sambhavati dharmadharmiṇos tulyakālatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2899: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2902: na hy atra kāraṇam eva kāryātmatām upaiti,
SA15arhebt_u:2903: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatir na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2904: kintv apūrvam eva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
SA15arhebt_u:2910: nanu ca tatsannidhau vijñānalakṣaṇakāryasambhavāt tajjananasvabhāvataivaiṣām avadhriyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2914: tataś ca vijñānam eva na kuryuḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2918: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣāṇajananātmakāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:2920: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhavatā /
SA15arhebt_u:2923: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyayavyāvṛttim upādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt_u:2930: apekṣāyāṃ vā katham ekam aneka[T. 277b.]kāryaṃ na syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2933: na ca nīlādīnām ātmabhedam adhyakṣam īkṣāmahe[428]/
SA15arhebt_u:2940: ekasyānekakriyā 'nabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:2946: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvad[431]anekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ {p. 102.1} naikāntiko bhedaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:2949: yadi tasya bhedas tadā bheda eveti /
SA15arhebt_u:2951: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:2952: na caikam eva kiñcit kvacit janayati /
SA15arhebt_u:2957: tasmād ekasāmagryadhīnajanmanāmeva sahabhāvaniyamo bhāvānām ekakāryakriyāniyamo vā /
SA15arhebt_u:2958: tataś ca svasantānakṣaṇam itaropādānaṃ[436]ca yugapad upakurvataḥ katham ekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:2960: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatām ācakṣāṇa [S. 104a.] ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ[437]?
SA15arhebt_u:2963: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda[439]ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedam abhidadhānaḥ sphuṭam ahrīka evāyam ity upekṣām arhati /
SA15arhebt_u:2968: [417] śaktyor bhede 'pi tadādhārasyaikyād aupacārikaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ity āśaṅkyāha -- na ca ityādi //
SA15arhebt_u:2973: [422] The order of the Tib. Fol. should be 275,
SA15arhebt_u:2975: 276 and 278 according to the S. Mss.
SA15arhebt_u:2991: [438] svabhāvasyaiva bhedo vastuna iti ced āha
SA15arhebt_u:2995_0: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaś
SA15arhebt_u:2997: yatas tadekopakāranirapekṣāḥ katham etāḥ śaktayo niyatārthādhārāḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:3008: deśakālasvabhāvābhedād abhedas tu yo 'bhyupagamyate so 'py anupapanna eva /
SA15arhebt_u:3009: tathā hi -- deśakālayor abhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ[444]katham abhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:3010: svabhāvo 'pi yadi dravyaparyāyayor dvayor api pratyekam anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpatā;
SA15arhebt_u:3012: na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam iti kathan tasmād abhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:3016: na tu tayor anuvṛttivyāvṛttī eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3018: na hi smṛtiḥ smarttuḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:3019: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyoś ca svabhāvatve[446]lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3021: atrāpy abheda iti yadi sādṛśyam ucyate;
SA15arhebt_u:3025: eva syāt na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3029: vipratiṣiddhaṃ hy etat ekasvabhāvatā dvirūpatā ceti /
SA15arhebt_u:3031: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ity ucyate anekaḥ san? /
SA15arhebt_u:3038: yogyatvāc ca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānām[447]ekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacid asambhavāt śaktibhedāc ca viṣayabhedaṃ bruvāṇaṃ [S. 105a.] prati abhihitam[448]/
SA15arhebt_u:3041: tathā hi -- śaśāṅkodayaṃ[449]bahavo nirīkṣante [T. 278a.] tasya katham {p. 104.1} ekatvam abhyupagatam? /
SA15arhebt_u:3044: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcid api saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3045: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭam khyāpyate,
SA15arhebt_u:3046: na punar asya bhāvato[450]dve rūpe staḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3047: atha punar dravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavad ekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvirūpam ucyate /
SA15arhebt_u:3051: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
SA15arhebt_u:3054: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt,

SA15arhebt_u:3426: vijñānādikāryasyānutpattiyaugapadyodayaprasaṅgāt cakṣurādisānnidhye prāg asat tat sāmarthyam utpannaṃ kramavac ceti niścaya iti cet /

SA15arhebt_u:3471_0: ity āha -- svabhāvas teṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāryakriyādharmā kāryakaraṇadharmā tena kāraṇena

SA15arhebt_u:3499: ,[515]tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt[516]ity ata āha -- na hi sa sāhitye 'pi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3500: tadaitad uttaraṃ bhāvatkaṃ sambadhyeta[517]yadi bhāvo yo 'sau paraḥ sahakāritvābhimataḥ [T. 292a.] sannidhīyate tadrūpeṇa karttā syāt na svarūpeṇa /

SA15arhebt_u:3528: `te[520]{p. 125.1} samarthā [S. 123b.] eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ [T. 293a.] prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti' ity atra /

SA15arhebt_u:3537: tena kārakākārakayor yau svabhāvau tayor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt /

SA15arhebt_u:3540: akārakasvabhāvajanakahetor utpannasyākārakasya svabhāvasyānyatvāt yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃprasaṅga iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3559: aparas tv anyathā sthirarūpeṣv ekārthākriyāpratiniyamaṃ [S. 124a.] kalpitavān tam upanyasyati yo 'pi manyata ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3565: sa evaṃvidhasvabhāvo na kadācit sāhityaṃ svakāryakaraṇe 'pekṣate yato 'nyaḥ sahito 'nyaś ca kevalaḥ kārakākārakasvabhāvabhedāt syāt /

SA15arhebt_u:3572: tataḥ {p. 126.1} tadātmanaḥ kāryasya sahitebhya eva bhāvād ekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam akṣaṇikānām
SA15arhebt_u:3574_0: siddhāntavādī pūrvadoṣānatikramam asya darśayann āha -- tasyāpi evaṃvādināḥ kathaṃsa
SA15arhebt_u:3574_1: nityābhimato bhāvaḥ kevalaḥkaroty eva `akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ' iti [S.124b.] vacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3577_0: tasmāt kevalān na bhavatīti tadavastho virodho yaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ. tathā hi -- yady
SA15arhebt_u:3577_1: akṣepakriyādharmā tadā 'vaśyam anena kāryaṃ kartavyam na ced avaśyaṃ karoti katham
SA15arhebt_u:3578: akṣepeṇa kāryadarśanād akṣepakriyāsvabhāvatā 'vagamyate [T. 294a.] nānyathā iti parābhiprāyāśaṅkayā ''ha -- na kevalaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3579: naivaṃ mayoktaṃ kevalaḥ karoty eveti kintv akṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti /

SA15arhebt_u:3585: sa eva hy akṣepakriyāsvabhāvo yaḥ karoty eva,
SA15arhebt_u:3586: yas tu nāvaśyaṃ karoti sa kathaṃ tadrūpaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:3587: yad apy uktaṃ `kāryasyaivāyam aparādho yat tasmiṃ(smin)

SA15arhebt_u:3591: āha -- paraṃ pratyayāntaram anādṛtya tiraskṛtya etat [S. 125a.] kāryaṃ prasahya
SA15arhebt_u:3593: ka evaṃ saty asya guṇo bhavati?
SA15arhebt_u:3594: iti cet, āha -- evaṃhi param anādṛtya haṭhāt svakāryaṃ kurvatā'nena kevalenāpi samarthena satā yat tadātmanaḥ kevalasyāpi sāmarthyaṃ tad darśitaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:3595: anyathā 'nyasahitasyaiva karaṇāt kevalasya ca kadācid apy akaraṇāt na `ayaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ' iti pareṣāṃ buddhiḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3597: tasmād ayuktam ucyate kāryaṃ [T. 294b.] pratyayāntarāpekṣam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3598: {p. 127.1} kāryāpekṣayā 'pi virodhasya tādavasthyaṃ darśayann āha -- kāryaṃparam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3599: kāryasya parāpekṣāṃ bruvan kevalāt kāraṇād anutpattim asya[527]kathayasi,
SA15arhebt_u:3600: `sa kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ' itīdaṃ vadaṃs tataḥ kevalād utpattiṃ kāryasya brūṣe /
SA15arhebt_u:3602: tata evaikasmāt kāraṇād utpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe katham ekatra kāryākhye dharmiṇi syātām?
SA15arhebt_u:3604: ekatra te bruvāṇo `mātā ca vandhyā ca' ity anena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na [S. 125b.] pūrvoktadoṣān mucyase,
SA15arhebt_u:3605_0: yata evam api bruvāṇo viruddham eva brūte na ca lakṣayati tat tasmāt ayam akṣaṇikavādī
SA15arhebt_u:3605_1: kṣaṇikapakṣasyānavadyatayā tadvādināṃ nirddoṣatāsampatsu amarṣalakṣaṇerṣyā eva śalyaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3605_2: antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmāṇi yasya so yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā
SA15arhebt_u:3606_0: apy alakṣayan viklavam ākulaṃ pūrvāparāsambaddhaṃ vikrośati viroditi iti kṛtvā asvasthacittavacaneṣv
SA15arhebt_u:3606_1: anādarāt taddoṣodbhāvanasya sutarāṃ duḥkhotpādanena kṣatakṣāraniṣekatulyatvāt upekṣām
SA15arhebt_u:3608: tad evam akṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcid ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ [T. 295a.] sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃhārann āha -- tasmād idam ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3609_0: yeṣāṃ hi sthirarūpatayā pṛthag api bhāvaḥ sambhavati teṣām akṣaṇikānāṃ pṛthak kevalānāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3609_1: kāryakaraṇasambhavena hetunā sahaiva kurvantīti sahakāritvaniyamāyogād idam ekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3619: nanu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam api sahakāritvaṃ bhāveṣu dṛśyate tat katham uktaṃ prāk[528]`sarvatra naivātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā,
SA15arhebt_u:3620: kiṃ tarhi bahūnām ekārthakaraṇam eva' ity ata āha -- yatra tu santānopakāreṇa {p. 128.1} ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3621: ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvaṃ sarvatra na kvacid atiśayotpādanaṃ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:3622_1: bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo vivakṣitakāryasya hetutāṃ pratipadyante- yathā taṇḍulādibhya odanādijanmani dahanodakādayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3623: bījādibhyaś cāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ -- tatra viśeṣotpādane pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt_u:3625: tya [T. 295b.] pūrvottarakṣaṇayor ekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyam atiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /
SA15arhebt_u:3627_1: pūrvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvam iti
SA15arhebt_u:3630: yadi tarhi kṣaṇike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
SA15arhebt_u:3632: tato yathā parasparato viśeṣamanāsādayanto 'pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitā eva kurvanti na kevalāḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3635: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum -- yo yasya prāg akārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa paścād apīti /
SA15arhebt_u:3636: tathā hi -- prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasyendriyam arthapratipattim akurvad api paścāt kurvāṇam upalabhyate / tad uktam --
SA15arhebt_u:3640: ata āha -- na hi taṇḍulādīnām ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3641: viśeṣānutpattau sannidhānasyāpy asannidhānatulyatvāt [S. 127a.] dahanādibhāve 'pi taṇḍulādibhyo naudanajanma syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3642: [T. 296a.] tathā prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāg iva paścād apy arthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet /
SA15arhebt_u:3643: {p. 129.1} tasmād yad asambhavi kāryaṃ yatra dṛśyate tasya tato 'nyatvam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:3644: śālibījād iva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayād anyatvam eva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti /
SA15arhebt_u:3645: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam aupacārikaṃ sahakāritvam ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva tu mukhyaṃ tatrāpīti pratipāditam /
SA15arhebt_u:3646: yatra tv akṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayam atiśayotpādanam asti?
SA15arhebt_u:3648: `ye hy avyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātās teṣv avilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:3650: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇī bhavanti?
SA15arhebt_u:3651: ity ata āha -- tatra yathāsvaṃ yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3652_1: deśaś ca sa ādir yasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānam avasthā yeṣāṃ te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā
SA15arhebt_u:3653: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
SA15arhebt_u:3655: na tu svahetubhya eva tathāvidhānām utpattau /
SA15arhebt_u:3656: yata evam iti tasmāt tatra teṣu akṣepakāriṣv indriyādiṣu ekārthakriyaiva mukhyaṃ sahakāritvaṃ na santānāśrayeṇa
SA15arhebt_u:3658: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:3659: tad api hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyam evety ata āha -- yatra tu kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15arhebt_u:3660_0: kintu {p. 230.1} vivakṣitakāryotpādānuguṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣam utpādayantaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:3660_1: tatra kālakṣepabhāvini kārye karttavye hetusantāno 'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3662: tatas tebhyaḥ kāraṇāntarebhyaḥ svabhāvāntarasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparamparālakṣaṇasya pratilabhyaḥ santānasyaikatvenādhimuktasyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt_u:3663: paramārthas tu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe [T. 297a.] viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ity ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvam
SA15arhebt_u:3666: , yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvarttayantīty ata āha -- tatra svarasataḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3667_0: tatra tasmin hetusantāne ye hetava upādānakāraṇākhyāḥ ye ca pratyayāḥ sahakārisaṃjñitās
SA15arhebt_u:3667_1: teṣāṃ ye pūrve [S. 128b.] prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato
SA15arhebt_u:3667_2: nivṛttau satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivarttamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena
SA15arhebt_u:3668: evaṃ yāvad atyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ity evaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3670: atra paraś codayann āha -- sahakāriṇaḥ saha karaṇaśīlāt kāraṇāt,
SA15arhebt_u:3672_0: yat samutpannaviśeṣam anantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato
SA15arhebt_u:3672_2: krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattir na syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3672_3: [T. 297b.] parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānām avivekāt anabhyupagamāc ca /
SA15arhebt_u:3673_0: parasparato 'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣam ārapsyanta iti ced āha
SA15arhebt_u:3675: tataś ca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ [S. 129a.] kāryaṃ kurvīran /
SA15arhebt_u:3677_0: iti cet, āha -- tena yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādā 'napekṣā eva svakāryaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:3677_1: kurvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena
SA15arhebt_u:3678: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥsvabhāvātiśayotpattiśca na syāt ity akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa[531]svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati / yad āha -
SA15arhebt_u:3689: iti / tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante --
SA15arhebt_u:3691: iti nyāyād dhi dūradeśavarttinām api hetuphalabhāvāt ity āśaṅkyāha -- atha sahakāriṇā ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3692: sahakāriṇaḥ [T. 298a.] parasparasamparkkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyam upakurvantīti sahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkkakāla upatiṣṭheta,
SA15arhebt_u:3694: tathā hi -- tadviśeṣotpattāv apy aparaḥ sahakārikṛto viśeṣo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:3696: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣanimittam aparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
SA15arhebt_u:3697: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3698_0: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane
SA15arhebt_u:3698_1: nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā yena yogyāvasthatvena nityānuśaktaḥ nityānubaddhaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:3698_2: eṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāṃ {p. 132.1} kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanako viśeṣaḥ syāt yataḥ `aviśiṣtād
SA15arhebt_u:3698_3: viśeṣotpattau kāryasyāpi syāt' ity etad api parihriyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:3699: kuta etad? ity āha -- tadupāya ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3700: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnām upāye -- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt[532]apāye ca -- parasparasamparkkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3701: yadi hi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā [T. 298b.] syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3702: tatas tatparamparābhāvi kāryam iti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
SA15arhebt_u:3703: [S. 130a.] tasmān na sahakāriṇaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane yogyāvasthāḥ sarvadeti /
SA15arhebt_u:3704: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataś ca prathamasamparkkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate[533]yujyate vā /
SA15arhebt_u:3705: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ notpadyate[534],
SA15arhebt_u:3707: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvinām api kṣaṇānām aviśeṣāt
SA15arhebt_u:3709_0: yathā kṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānām
SA15arhebt_u:3709_1: api bhaviṣyatīti kṣīṇasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyam evātura iva bahumanyamānas tatraiva
SA15arhebt_u:3710: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā param upahasann āha -- nāsmākaṃpunaḥpunaḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3711: yadi punaḥ punar vacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītir bhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:3712: kim aṅga punar dvau trīn vā vārān? /
SA15arhebt_u:3713: na hi parārthapravṛttānām asmākaṃ punaḥ punar abhidhāne kaścid udvego bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:3714: evaṃ vādinaś ca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa[536]tam evārthaṃ [T. 299a.] sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktāparihārāya yat ante sa teṣām asthānapariśrama eva /
SA15arhebt_u:3715: yadi nodvego hanta tarhy ucyatām ity ata āha -- na viśeṣotpādanād eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:3716: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt {p. 133.1} sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit [S. 130b.] sambhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:3717: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe karttavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:3718: kintv ekārthakriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhir yuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
SA15arhebt_u:3721: para āha -- sā 'py ekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
SA15arhebt_u:3722: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānām api tadekārthakriyā 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyām iva pṛthag api sā bhavet /
SA15arhebt_u:3723: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyām api parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
SA15arhebt_u:3724: teṣāṃ pṛthag api tadviśeṣakriyā katham iva na prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt_u:3725: na hy eṣāṃ saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayoḥ kaścid viśeṣo 'stīti /
SA15arhebt_u:3727: iti cet; tathāca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam aṅkurādi kāryam api viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cen manyase,
SA15arhebt_u:3729: tathā hi -- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayor nirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti taducyate tat kiṃ tāvad viśeṣamātrāpekṣayā?

SA15arhebt_u:4007_5: vā 'nupalabdhavināśaḥ kṛtako 'pi sadrūpa ākāśādir vā 'kṛtakaḥ [S. 141a.] san na 'tatsvabhāvo
SA15arhebt_u:4010: tataś ca vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt tadanapekṣatvam asiddham iti tadvaśāt[564]sādhyasya [T 309a.] kṣaṇikatvasya sattvasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ tannibandhanā nānvayavyatirekasiddhir iti /

SA15arhebt_u:4012: vicitrasvabhāvā hi bhāvā dṛśyante -- kecit[565]sapratighāḥ kecid[566]apratighāḥ,

SA15arhebt_u:4031: evaṃ manyate -- iha tāvad idam eva vicāraṇīyam [S. 141b.] kiṃ lakṣaṇam etad bhāvānāṃ sattvaṃ yuktam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4035: vandhyāsutādīnām asattvāt kathaṃ sattāyogaḥ? iti cet /

SA15arhebt_u:4039: yadi ca satām eva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhy anyat sattvalakṣaṇam abhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,
SA15arhebt_u:4042: evaṃ sati yad evārthakriyāsāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ity arthakriyāsāmarthyam eva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātam ity apārthakaḥ sattāyogaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4044: anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:4045: arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ tu sarveṣām astīti tad eva bhāvalakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt_u:4051: yathā ca dhrauvyaṃ na tathotpādavyayāv iti naikaṃ vastu yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ [S. 142a.] syāt /

SA15arhebt_u:4060_0: nanu ca śakter atīndriyatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kāryārambhaniyamābhāvāc ca kathaṃ tadviraho
SA15arhebt_u:4060_2: sattvaṃ kṣaṇikātmatām evānubhavet yato 'nvayavyatirekau syātām ity ata āha -- kramayaugapadyābhyām ityādi /

SA15arhebt_u:4064_1: kāryakriyāśakter api nivṛttir iti sarvaśaktivirahalakṣaṇam asattvam akṣaṇikatve vyāpakānupalabdhir ākarṣati,

SA15arhebt_u:4067: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyām eva kriyata ity ucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ [T. 310b.] kāryātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:4071: tataḥ prakārāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāv api nārthakriyāsāmartthyanivṛttir iti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇam asattvam?
SA15arhebt_u:4075: [S. 143a.] tathā hi -- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyam aṅkurādeḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:4079: kevalasya vā 'bhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne saty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate /
SA15arhebt_u:4080: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ[569]pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4081: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatītarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4082: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva [T. 311a.] prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāśaktir avyāptā syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:4083: śāstrakāras tu yathā pratyakṣatā eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam etena kramākramādayo 'pīti atidiśan vakṣyati /

SA15arhebt_u:4114: tanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt[575]kṣaṇikatāyām eva sattvam iti yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhir iti //[576]

SA15arhebt_u:4128_0: tad evaṃ svabhāvahetau tādātmyasiddhinibandhanam anvayavyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādya
SA15arhebt_u:4128_1: kāryahetau kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinimittatvāt tayos tasyāś ca pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanāyāḥ

SA15arhebt_u:4130_0: kasmāt [S. 145a.] punar arthāntare kāryam eva hetur ity āha -- avyabhicārāt iti kāryam

SA15arhebt_u:4132: tam ihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayed ity āśaṅkamāna āha -- kāryakāraṇa- ityādi [T. 312b.] yadi hi kāryaṃ hetur ucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam /
SA15arhebt_u:4133: tathā ca sati sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
SA15arhebt_u:4134: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4135: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4138: sa ca nāgnidhūmayor aṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa /
SA15arhebt_u:4139: tathā hi -- yathā agnir agnitvadravyatvasatvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmair janakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhir viśeṣadharmair api,

SA15arhebt_u:4144: atrāha -- na sarvathājanyajanakabhāvaḥ tataś ca kutas tathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:4146: {p. 151.1} tadbhāve teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādīnāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇām abhāve bhavato dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evam ātmanaḥ tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4147: tathā tadabhāve agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ [T. 313a.] sāmānyadharmasyāgner evāyaṃ bhavatīty evaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:4149: na hy asati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ[579]/

SA15arhebt_u:4152: ca tṛtīyā / avinābhāvi vinā na bhavati /

SA15arhebt_u:4158: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvair yāvadbhir agnitvadravyatvādibhir avinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam /

SA15arhebt_u:4990: yataḥ {p. 186.1} samudāyasādhyatā liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandho vā syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:4991: kuto na sambhavatīty āha -- tadviśeṣapratipatter eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipatter eva tadabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:4992: yataś ca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:4993: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:4994: āha -- tasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya anyatra sajātīye anvayasya anuvṛtter abhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
SA15arhebt_u:4995: na hy asau deśakālāvasthāniyato viśeṣo 'nyam anvetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5000: tadā pratijñāyā yo 'rtho dharmadharmisamudāyas tadekadeśa eva dharmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5003: atha mā bhūt [S. 177a.] eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo hetur iṣyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5004: kin tu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitam ity ata āha -- na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃtatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5005: saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvād anaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5007: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitas tādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:5008: tathāvidhapradeśaviśeṣapratītir eva ghaṭābhāvapratītis tato 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ liṅgaliṅgitā 'nupapannety upadarśayann āha -- nanu tasyaiva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5009: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayā 'vasthāpitas tasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ity anena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
SA15arhebt_u:5010: tad eva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5011: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya 1pratipattāv eva[683]siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ[684]sidhyati /
SA15arhebt_u:5012: tataḥ kasyedānīṃ tatpratipattāv eva sādhyapratītau satyāṃ talliṅgam[685]? /
SA15arhebt_u:5014: jijñāsitasya ghaṭābhāvasya siddher anyasya kasyacid ajijñāsitatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5016: ca yad etad uttarakālaṃ `yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśas tatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ` iti [S. 177b.] anvayasyānugamāmanu(gamanam anu)
SA15arhebt_u:5017: saraṇam, tac ca nirarthakam ādāv eva sādhyapratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5018: yata evaṃ tasmād anyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedābhāvān na sādhanam abhāvasyeti sthitam /
SA15arhebt_u:5019_0: tad evaṃ [T. 340b.] samudāyasādhyatāṃ 3liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā sambandhaṃ[686]pratipādayituṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5019_1: yad uktaṃ pareṇa -- `pradeśādidharmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt`[687]iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:5020: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayor darśayann āha -- asty anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5021: tataḥ sambandhasadbhāvād anyabhāvād abhāvasya siddhir bhaviṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5022: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayor virodham evāsambhāvayan pṛcchati -- kena kasya virodhaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5023: na hy atra sādhyasādhanayor virodhaḥ saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5024: paro virodham abhiprāyānabhijñātayā darśayati -- anyabhāvena kevalapradeśātmanā pratiyogino yasyābhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭo ghaṭādes tasyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5025: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitām ādarśayann āha -- kiṃnu vai pratiyogī ghaṭādiḥ pramātum iṣṭo yena pratiyogināḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginor virodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5026: naiva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kin tu tadabhāva iti cet,
SA15arhebt_u:5028: [kumārilas tu manyate bhāvāṃśād bhinno '] [S. 179a.] yam abhāvāṃśas tato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5030: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yad āha --
SA15arhebt_u:5031: na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā//
SA15arhebt_u:5039: tat kathaṃ tatpratipattir evāparasya vyavacchedanam iti tannirāsārtham āha /
SA15arhebt_u:5040_0: tasyānyasya pradeśasya [T. 342a.] kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākitvam asahāyatā
SA15arhebt_u:5040_1: tad eva aparasya pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ vaikalyam abhāva iti tasmāt tadanyabhāva eva
SA15arhebt_u:5040_2: bhāvāṃśa eva tvad abhimataḥ tadabhāvaḥpratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaram
SA15arhebt_u:5041: tataś ca tatpratipattir eva ca tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattir eva 5ca tadapratipattiḥ[688] tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattir abhāvapratipattir iti yāvat /
SA15arhebt_u:5042: evaṃ manyate -- yo 'yam abhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ [S. 179a.] tadrūpavaikalyād evānubhavati nānyathā /
SA15arhebt_u:5046: na hi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvam anubhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5049: sarvaṃ ca viśvam ekaṃ dravyaṃ prasajyeta,
SA15arhebt_u:5051: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syād ity avaśyam anyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
SA15arhebt_u:5053: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyabhāvābhāvasaṃyoga [T. 342b.] iti kim ucyate --
SA15arhebt_u:5057: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyābhāvātmake[690]eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścāt yasya {p. 189.1} yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5058: vistarataś cāyam abhāvavicāraḥpramāṇadvitvasiddhāv abhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvadhārya iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5061_1: darśayann āha -- anyathā yadi tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti neṣyate[691]tadā
SA15arhebt_u:5061_2: tasya anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato 'nyasyātadrūpasya avyavacchede anirākaraṇe
SA15arhebt_u:5061_3: tadabhāvāpratipattau tatpariccheda eva na syāt -- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattir eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5063_0: tadatadrūpayoḥ tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5063_1: yac cātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ avivekād avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanād
SA15arhebt_u:5064: sakalapararūpāsaṅkīrṇaṃ hi tadrūpam tac cet [T. 343a.] tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākāram[692]eva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathan tena tatparicchedaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5065: syāt? / na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā -- śuklaśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti /
SA15arhebt_u:5066: pratiniyatarūpānukāre vā tatparicchedasya katham anyā 'vyavacchedo nāma? /
SA15arhebt_u:5070_0: ity ata āha -- ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ sarvajanapratītaḥ kasyacid agnyāder vastuno darśanāt
SA15arhebt_u:5070_1: kvaciddeśe tatsambandhini [S. 180b.] prāptyartho dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca parihārārthaḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5072: na hi yasmād ayaṃpratipattā analaṃpaśyann api saṅkīrṇatadatadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
SA15arhebt_u:5074: tathā hi -- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacid etaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt_u:5075: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇadarśanavān {p. 190.1} pratipattā katham analam eva paśyati na salilādikam? /
SA15arhebt_u:5076: kin tu saṅkīrṇarūpavastupratibhāsijñānatayā salilādikam api paśyati /
SA15arhebt_u:5077: tataḥ kathaṃ salilārthītatra agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta? /
SA15arhebt_u:5080: yas tu salilābhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasyānupalambhena /
SA15arhebt_u:5081: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayor vivekāl loke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5082: siddhāntavādy āha -- ko 'yam anupalambho nāma iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5083: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātram ity ata āha -- yadi salila ity ādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5084: kumārilasya tu salilopalambhanivṛttimātraṃ tuccharūpam abhāvapramāṇatayā nābhimatam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5088: kin tu yo 'bhāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā 'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti param abhyupagamayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5091: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmād anya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5092: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
SA15arhebt_u:5094: na hi rūpajñānād rasādyabhāvapratītir yuktamatī [T. 344a.] deśādiviprakarṣavato vā /
SA15arhebt_u:5096: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt_u:5098: tadabhāvavyavahāre tv asmadabhimataivānupalabdhir āyāteti pratipādayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5100: [S. 181b.] tuccharūpo 'nupalambhas tadā katham {p. 191.1} abhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:5102: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kin tu taddhetubhāva ity āha -- pratipattihetur vā iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5103: na hi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5104: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananād abhāvajñānam evaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5106: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktam ity āha -- tasyāpi salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
SA15arhebt_u:5107: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayam apratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacid api /
SA15arhebt_u:5108: tad evāha -- tasya salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilād anyasyānalādeḥ `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` ity ata ātmano 'pariṇāmasya pṛthag avasthāpanāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5109: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya [T. 344b.] tadātmakatvān na tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:5110: tataś ca kasyacid api [S. 182a.] tasya tadanyasya vā 'pratipattāv api yady abhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsv api salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5113: vyavadhānādigrahaṇena caitaddarśayaty anyavastuno 'pi anyatvaṃ tattulyayogyatārūpāpekṣam eva,
SA15arhebt_u:5117_0: prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītir na yujyate 'nalapratibhāsinaś ca jñānasya
SA15arhebt_u:5117_1: pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate tasmād ayam analadarśī pratipattā 'nalaṃ paśyann
SA15arhebt_u:5117_2: api saṅkīrṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena `analo 'yaṃ na salilam` iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃś
SA15arhebt_u:5117_3: ca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī na tiṣṭhet pravarteta nāpi pratiṣṭheta
SA15arhebt_u:5118: tathā hi -- salilaṃ nāma tad ucyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ[694]sakalatadanyarūpāsaṅkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
SA15arhebt_u:5119: idaṃ tv anyad eva śabalarūpaṃ kim apy avabhāsata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5120: {p. 192.1} tataśca pravṛttinivṛttiyor viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt dustaraṃvyasanaṃpratipattuḥsyāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5121: atra parasya [S. 182b.] vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- tata eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5122: na mayā [T. 345a.] salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tuccharūpāt tadabhāvagatir ucyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5124: kin tu yad etad ekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatir bhavati `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` iti vacanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5127: tathā hi -- tasmin dṛśyamāne tadevāstīty avagacchatu,
SA15arhebt_u:5128: tadanyat tu nāstīti kim iti pratyetīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5129: tasyaiva paridṛśyamānasyānalādeḥ kevalasya salilāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya darśanād analajñāne pratibhāsanāt `salilaṃ nāsti` iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5130: tathā hi -- anala iva salilam api yadi tatrābhāviṣyat tadapy analavad darśane pratyabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5131: tasmād ekapratibhāsanam anyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ity anyābhāve tato jñānam utpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati /
SA15arhebt_u:5133: tadrūpatayaiva[695]ca tajjñānam anyat[696]pratiyad evaṃ vyapadiśyate 'nyathā[697]tadayogād[698]ity anyapratipattir eva tadabhāvavikalpahetur iti siddhāntavādy āha
SA15arhebt_u:5135: nanv asmābhir idam eva prāg abhihitaṃ tayoḥsatoḥnaikarūpaniyatāpratipattiḥ asambhavāt[699] ity ādibhir vacanaiḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5136: tato yad evānyāsaṃsarggiṇaḥ kevalasya [T. 345b.] pratibhāsanaṃ tad eva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
SA15arhebt_u:5137: tasyaiva kevalasya tadanyābhāvātmakatvād anyasya cābhāvāṃśasya nirastatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5138: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tadbalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ {p. 193.1} vikalpakam ājāyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5140: yatas tadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakam apy anavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthag abhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt_u:5141: tathā hi -- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5143: na hi vikalpajñānasyāpi tadākāraśūnyarūpasaṃvedanād anyat tadabhāvasaṃvedanaṃ nāma /
SA15arhebt_u:5146: anale `analo 'trāsti` iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt_u:5147: tathā nāstitājñānam api vikalpakaṃ tatphaladvāreṇa vā 'nyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthag abhāvākhyaṃ [S. 183b.] pramāṇam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5148: tasmād yad evāsmābhir abhihitaṃ tadanyābhāvapratītiṃ prati,
SA15arhebt_u:5149: tad eva tvayā 'py abhidhīyata iti kasmāt puruṣam ivābhāti yatas tadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇam abhyupagatam ity upahasati /
SA15arhebt_u:5150: tathā hy agaty edānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedam eva kiṃ na pūrvam evābhihitam?
SA15arhebt_u:5151: , yata ālajālābhidhānena ''tmā parikleśita [T. 346a.] ity upasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tīrādarśineva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5152: yathā kila vahanārūḍhair vaṇigbhiḥ śakunirmucyate api nāma tīraṃ drakṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt_u:5153: sa yadā sarvataḥ paryaṭaṃstīraṃ nāsādayati tadā vahanam evāgacchati tadvad etad api draṣṭavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5154: yataś cāvaśyābhyupagamanīyo 'yaṃ pakṣas tasmān na kiñcid anayā 'vidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā
SA15arhebt_u:5156_0: tad evaṃ parasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayor liṅgaliṅgibhāvam icchataḥ sambandhābhāvād[700]asāv
SA15arhebt_u:5156_1: ayuktaḥ iti pratipādite pareṇa `asati sambandhe 'nyabhāvagatyā 'pi tadabhāvagatir
SA15arhebt_u:5156_2: na syāt` iti codite `na vai kutaścit sambandhād` ity ādy abhihitam /
SA15arhebt_u:5157_0: tataḥ `anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo 'nyabhāvagatir eva ca tadabhāvagatiḥ` iti prasādhayatākumārilaparikalpitaḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5157_1: kasyacid abhāvaniścayārtham abhāvapramāṇavādaḥ prasaṅgato nirastaḥ samprati tu --
SA15arhebt_u:5160: ity etad āhatya nirākartuṃ [S. 184a.] pūrvapakṣam utthāpayann āha -- yady ekaparicchedād eva ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5161: yadi hi ekasya kevalasya paricchedād anyasya vyavacchedaḥpratiṣedhaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyā a(-syā)
SA15arhebt_u:5162: nyasyā 'viśeṣeṇaiva tatra deśe yatrāsāv ekaḥ paridṛśyate tatrābhāvasiddhir bhavet,

SA15arhebt_u:5785_0: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ eva tasmin sādhyadharme satyeva bhavati ity evaṃśīlo 'smad upavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt
SA15arhebt_u:5785_1: [T. 367b.] yadīṣyate tadākatham anyathākriyeta hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5788_0: vastūnāṃ [S. 208b.] hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ -- `saty eva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ`
SA15arhebt_u:5788_1: -- tadanyathābhāvasya tadviparyayasya abhāvād ubhayoś ca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve
SA15arhebt_u:5788_2: {p. 220.1} svabhāvata eva dharmiṇy ekatra tayor bhāve viruddāv ubhau svabhāvāv ekasya syātām /
SA15arhebt_u:5792: asaty api sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt katham anyadā'pi apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyām api sādhanaṃkasyacit? /
SA15arhebt_u:5796: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5797_0: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaś caiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena [S. 209.1a.]
SA15arhebt_u:5797_2: kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavād alakṣaṇam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5801: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayor na bhavaty eveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5802: tad evam anayor dvayo rūpayor yaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvā 'sambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti hetvābhāsās tato 'para iti ity asyārtho vivṛta iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5804_0: abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kāryasvabhāvahetvor evāvinābhāve sati
SA15arhebt_u:5804_1: bādhāpratihetvor asambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena saty api liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5810: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpam iti [T. 368b.] kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
SA15arhebt_u:5811: yady api vikalpapratibhāsī sāmanyākāro liṅgatayā 'vasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā /
SA15arhebt_u:5812: na hy asau svatantra eva liṅgam /
SA15arhebt_u:5813: yad āha -- vikalpabhedāna {p. 221.1} svatantrāṇām anvarthāśrayaṇāt tatkalpitaviṣayāda[766]'rthapratipattāv[767] anarthapratilambha eva syāt iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5816_0: vastudarśanahāneḥ[768]svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayāc ca taddharmatām eva tv anusmaranto
SA15arhebt_u:5816_1: vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān[769]saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhād avisaṃvādakāḥ
SA15arhebt_u:5817: na ca tasya kāryāder ātmarūpaṃ [S. 209.2a.] jñātam /
SA15arhebt_u:5821: yasmād abāhyāsyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'py anuyāyitayā sāmānyāmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatayā kutaḥ? yadā ''ha --
SA15arhebt_u:5826: etad eva sādhayann āha -- kiṃrūpād ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5827_0: kim ātmakāt hetor anumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ prakṛtāyāṃ pratipattuḥ puṃso
SA15arhebt_u:5827_1: yad avisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpam abhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ [T. 369a.] yasya
SA15arhebt_u:5827_2: rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ôyatra tadrūpasambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tadrūpavikalam
SA15arhebt_u:5827_3: asādhanamô iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yat tatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt
SA15arhebt_u:5828: tathā, etasmiṃś ca nyāye [S. 209.2b.] vyavasthite yad asya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tal lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam /
SA15arhebt_u:5829: syād etad -- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatety ata āha -- pratipattijanmani ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5830: yady anumeyapratītijanmany upayujyate jñānam iti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam iṣyate tadā 'tiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
SA15arhebt_u:5831_0: tam evāha -- evaṃpratipattijanmany upayogamātrāl liṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya arthasya
SA15arhebt_u:5831_1: puruṣasya {p. 222.1} pramātuḥ adi śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnām ālokamanaskārādīnāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5832: atra kāraṇam āha -- na hi teṣv api prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
SA15arhebt_u:5833: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- niścitagrahaṇaṃtarhi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5834: yadi pararūpatvāj jñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yad etadācāryeṇa --
SA15arhebt_u:5837: niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavataś cābhimataṃ [T. 369b.] tan na karttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5838: tathā hi -- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5840: jñānaṃ kim iti neśyate yato niścayo vijñānam eva tadviśeṣatvād asyeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5841: siddhāntavāy āha -- na na karttavyaṃ kintu kartavyam eva tasya [S. 210a.] niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanād anyārthatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5842: tām evānyārthatāṃ darśayann āha -- sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5843: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetum icchanti /
SA15arhebt_u:5844: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho hetur bhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15arhebt_u:5845: yataḥ sator vidyamānayor api darśanādarśanayor agamakatvaṃ hetor dṛśyate `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5847_0: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā 'sapakṣe ca
SA15arhebt_u:5847_1: sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako hetur ity
SA15arhebt_u:5847_2: asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5848: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yāv eva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyām
SA15arhebt_u:5850: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇety asyārthasya [S. 210b.] jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5852: yena viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayor eva khyāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
SA15arhebt_u:5855: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt_u:5856: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5857: {p. 223.1} nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayor bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetum icchanti,
SA15arhebt_u:5860: iti, ata āha -- tau hi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5861: yady api pare bhāvābhāvābhyām eva gamakaṃ hetum icchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti /
SA15arhebt_u:5862: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhāu sidhyataḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5863: pratibandhavikalānām apy athānāṃ kvacid bhāvābhāvayoḥ kathañciddarśanādarśanasambhavāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5864_0: tasmād [S. 211a.] yau `hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evam ātmakau
SA15arhebt_u:5864_1: bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṇ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5866: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveśāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5869: yata upayāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayor viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇakāeṇeti /
SA15arhebt_u:5870: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrād eva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayor eva sattā na prasidhyed iti,
SA15arhebt_u:5873: ity anenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ [T. 370b.] bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇa niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayor bhāvābhāvayor yat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttir yady apy ākṣipyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5874: kathaṃ punar niścitagrahaṇam antareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratas tadvṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ?
SA15arhebt_u:5875: ity āha -- anyathā yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir nākṣipyeta,
SA15arhebt_u:5876: [S. 211b.] tadā tayor eva sapakṣavipakṣayor eva bhāvābhāvayor yā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā aprasiddheḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5878: ity āha -- jñānasya upalabdher yā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvāj jñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5879: na hy upalambham antareṇa svata evārthāḥ {p. 224.1} sidhyanti,
SA15arhebt_u:5881: tasmād idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃrūpam iti tadākārajñānodayād eva vyavasthāpyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5882: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā 'pi tatsādhanaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5884: kiñ ca, parārthatvāc ca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir ākṣipyata iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5885: kīdṛśaṃ punas tacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākṣipati?
SA15arhebt_u:5887_0: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttim
SA15arhebt_u:5887_1: ākṣipatīty āha -- tadrūpaṃ tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye
SA15arhebt_u:5888: na teśāṃ tatas trirūpāl liṅgāc chāstroktād vāñcite 'rthe pravṛttir bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5890: yata evam iti tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvād eva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvād eva pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddham iti yady api niścitagrahaṇam atiricyate tathāpi tāv eva
SA15arhebt_u:5891: liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayor bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śastroktau `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5892_0: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ --
SA15arhebt_u:5892_1: tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5893: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt_u:5894_0: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau
SA15arhebt_u:5894_1: bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T. 371b.] neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi
SA15arhebt_u:5894_2: saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5896: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p. 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5897: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt_u:5899: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5901: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ
SA15arhebt_u:5902: kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5903: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha /
SA15arhebt_u:5905: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T. 372a.] darśayann āha -- yato 'pi ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5908: tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5910: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt_u:5911: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo [S. 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15arhebt_u:5914: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi /
SA15arhebt_u:5915: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc ca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5917: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5919: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5923: tathā hi -- anvayo hetoḥ {p. 226.1} sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5925: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ [T. 372b.] parasparam antarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayor bhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5926: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt_u:5927: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? /
SA15arhebt_u:5928: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5931: yato yathā 'nvayavyatirekau [S. 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā tayo)
SA15arhebt_u:5936: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5937: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt_u:5940: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt_u:5944: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- lakṣaṇavākyapratipāditāv anvayavyatirekāv āśritya parasparāntarbhāvaścodyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5946: tathā hi -- `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
SA15arhebt_u:5949: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5950: tataś caikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣyor bhāvābhāvapratipādakena [S. 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5952: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti /
SA15arhebt_u:5953: {p. 227.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- vacanam etad `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ityādirūpam ubhayamākṣipati pratipādayati /
SA15arhebt_u:5956: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5957: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5958: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:5961: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt_u:5962: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya [S. 214b.] pratipādanāl
SA15arhebt_u:5963: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktam iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5964_0: syānmatam -- kevalāv api tarhy ekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau
SA15arhebt_u:5964_1: bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau
SA15arhebt_u:5965: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva,
SA15arhebt_u:5966: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5969: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vā 'bhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5970_0: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta
SA15arhebt_u:5970_1: iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S. 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva {p.
SA15arhebt_u:5970_2: 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
SA15arhebt_u:5973: tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt_u:5974: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt_u:5975: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt_u:5976: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva /
SA15arhebt_u:5977: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5978: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt_u:5979: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt_u:5981: tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T. 374b.] āha -- naivam,
SA15arhebt_u:5986: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvād iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt_u:5987: iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti /
SA15arhebt_u:5988: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtam iti
SA15arhebt_u:5990: athāvi(pi )jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānam ākṣipati /
SA15arhebt_u:5991: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam /
SA15arhebt_u:5993: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha -- tasmān na hetuḥṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ/
